entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 early this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 20 in the afternoon.
